heroSection.title: Capturing Life's Beautiful Moments
heroSection.description: Professional photography for weddings, portraits, and special events

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description1: Hi, I'm Sarah, a professional photographer with over 10 years of experience capturing life's most precious moments.
aboutMe.description2: My passion is creating timeless images that tell your unique story with authenticity and artistry.

feedbacks.quote: Sarah captured our wedding perfectly! The photos are stunning and bring back all the emotions.
feedbacks.name: Jessica & Michael

feedbacks.quote: The family portraits we got were beyond our expectations. Professional and creative!
feedbacks.name: The Wilson Family

feedbacks.quote: Our corporate event photos were delivered quickly and looked amazing. Highly recommend!
feedbacks.name: TechStart Inc.
